DOC.criteria: Age 1835 Normal menstrual period ( 2435 day ) Good general health Willing use nonhormonal form contraception entire study ( Acceptable form contraception include condom , spermicide , sexual contact sterilize partner , subject surgically sterile , samesex partner , Copper IUD abstinence ) Willing able return clinic biweekly blood test Pregnant breast feed Polycystic ovarian disease Gastrointestinal condition ( i.e.gastric ulcer ) Currently use birth control Known allergy aspirin , nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDS ) Sulfadrugs Diabetes Cardiac disease hypertension Moderate severe heartburn ( GERD ) Obesity ( BMI great 30 )
